Introduction
------------

This package contains the ANN library with some minor patches to make it compilable with the latest gcc compilers (4.3/4.4). These patches are provided by www.ros.org.
Aditionally this package contains CMake scrips to generate the the ANN library with the cmake build system. The original makefiles are still available as documentation.
Further datails about the ANN library can be found in the ./ReadMe.txt. 

This file and the cmake files (CMakeLists.txt) follow the same license as documented in ./License.txt.


Installation
------------

Standard cmake approach:

mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. or (cmake-gui)
make


Impressum
---------

Written by Sebastian Blumenthal (blumenthal@gps-stuttgart.de)
Last update: 12.10.2010
